DataElement.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Investigator Identifier Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The name or identifier of a investigator, an individual who conducts scientific research in a clinical setting, participating in the Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network (PEARL), an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Investigator Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the name or identifier of a investigator, an individual who conducts scientific research in a clinical setting, participating in the Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network (PEARL), an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Investigator
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.:a researcher in a clinical trial or clinical study.

Concepts.longName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network
Concepts.definition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.
